actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to apply cost-of-living increases to annuities payable under the retired serviceman's family protection plan and to continue payment of annuities under such plan to widows or widowers who remarry at age 60 or thereafter.

summary.text: Provides for the application of cost-of-living increases to annuities payable under the Retired Serviceman's Family Protection Plan. Provides for the continued payment of annuities under such plan to widows or widowers who remarry at age 60 or thereafter.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to apply cost-of-living increases to annuities payable under the retired serviceman's family protection plan and to continue payment of annuities under such plan to widows or widowers who remarry at age 60 or thereafter.
